results.title: The neuroprotective effect of statin in traumatic brain injury: A systematic review
results.text_hl: ...The effect of oral @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ 40 mg daily for 10 days in individuals with @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@ was researched by Shafiee et al, revealing that administration of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ had a substantial impact in enhancing Glasgow @DISEASE_Coma @DISEASE_MESH:D003128 @@@Coma@@@ Scale (GCS) score in severe @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@ individuals.

results.title: Effect of drug therapy on nerve repair of moderate-severe traumatic brain injury: A network meta-analysis
results.text_hl: However, compared with placebo treatment, Bradycor, @CHEMICAL_Progesterone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011374 @@@progesterone@@@, @CHEMICAL_Selenium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012643 @@@selenium@@@, TXA, @GENE_EPO @GENE_2056 @@@EPO@@@, @CHEMICAL_HU_211 @CHEMICAL_MESH:C062018 @@@dexanabinol@@@, Tracoprodi, @CHEMICAL_Atorvastatin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000069059 @@@atorvastatin@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, and beta-blocker -therapy did not significantly improve the prognosis of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injuries_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000070642 @@@TBI@@@, and the differences were not statistically significant (all p > 0.05).

citations.NLM: Li M, Huo X, Wang Y, Li W, Xiao L, Jiang Z, Han Q, Su D, Chen T, Xia H. Effect of drug therapy on nerve repair of moderate-severe traumatic brain injury: A network meta-analysis Front Pharmacol. 2022;13():1021653. PMID: 36408253
